org.jbiowh.tools.defaultTools

Class AbstractDefaultTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jbiowh.tools.defaultTools.AbstractDefaultTool
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AntibioticGeneNeighbors, AntibioticGeneNeighborTax, BiomlParser, CreateTaxonomyTree, DataSetLoader, DataSetReport, DrugNeighbors, DrugProteinPathwayGraph, ExtractGiFromFasta, FindALLHumProt, FindALLHumProtinGO, FindALLHumProtinGOwithConst, FindGeneBankFlat, FindGeneBankTax, FindGenefromDrug, FindGeneFromGeneBankPos, FindGenefromProteinGi, FindonGeneBankperTaxFamily, FindOnRefSeqFlat, FindProtein, FindProteinFromTaxonomy, FindTaxonomyGraph, FrecPathGeneNeighbors, GenesDrugsFromTaxonomyFamily, GenomeDataFromTaxGraph, InsertDBToDB, MSParserTool, PPIGraph, PrideXMLParser, ReformatFasta, Test

    public abstract class AbstractDefaultTool
extends Object
    This class is to parse the default options on the command line tool using JBioWH $Author: r78v10a07@gmail.com $ $LastChangedDate: 2013-08-27 09:24:09 +0200 (Tue, 27 Aug 2013) $ $LastChangedRevision: 656 $
    Since:
    Aug 31, 2012

      • parseDefaultOptions

        protected joptsimple.OptionSet parseDefaultOptions(joptsimple.OptionParser parser,
                                       String[] args,
                                       boolean hasArguments)
                                            throws FileNotFoundException
        Method to parse the command line arguments
        Parameters:
        parser - Parses command line arguments, using a syntax that attempts to take from the best of POSIX getopt() and GNU getopt_long()
        args - arguments to parse
        hasArguments - true if the tool needs arguments
        Returns:
        a representation of a group of detected command line options, their arguments, and non-option arguments
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException

      • parseOption

        protected Object parseOption(joptsimple.OptionSet options,
                 String option,
                 Object defaultValue,
                 boolean hasArgument,
                 boolean isObligatory)
        Parse the command line option
        Parameters:
        options - a representation of a group of detected command line options, their arguments, and non-option arguments
        option - the option to be parsed
        defaultValue - the default value for this option, null is not default value
        hasArgument - true if the option has an argument
        isObligatory - true if the option is obligatory
        Returns:
        the argument for the option or true if the option does not have argument but is present on the command line

      • printDefaultHelp

        protected void printDefaultHelp()
        Method to print the help

      • openConnection

        protected void openConnection(boolean isMain,
                  boolean createSchema,
                  boolean startThread)
                       throws SQLException
        Create the WHDBMS factory and open the connection with the DBMS
        Parameters:
        isMain - true if the opened WHDBMSFactory should be set as Main schema
        createSchema - true if the schema have to be created
        startThread - true to setup a thread to check the connection every hour
        Throws:
        SQLException

                        throws SQLException
